summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Robert Glassman, notifying him that Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys intend to file a new bail application. The email serves as advance notice and offers to provide updates.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's upcoming bail application.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the email; her attorneys are preparing to file a new bail application.

connections.description: Glassman is being formally notified by a prosecutor about Maxwell's legal proceedings, suggesting he has a role or interest in the case.

events.title: Notification of upcoming bail application
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails Robert Glassman to inform him that Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys intend to file a new bail application.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team was preparing a new bail application as of December 2, 2020.
The notification came from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
Robert Glassman was a recipient of this advance legal notification, indicating his involvement or interest in the case.
